Pre-Game Insights: England's Alex Hales made his first mistake in the match
Harry Brook ensured England kept the asking rate under control and launched his match-winning onslaught
Pakistan struggled against spin and over-relied on the openers
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan scored quickly but couldn't convert their starts
Pakistan's run-rate dipped with spinners operating from both ends
England's Alex Hales set the base for the team in the powerplay
Miscellaneous Highlights: England needed just 16 off 18 to win
